Interface Shape

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractShape, Arrow, Circle, Cross
public interface Shape

Provides a template to construct shapes of various sizes.

Version:
CSC 143 Winter 15
Author:
Matthew Staehely

Method Summary
 Color getColor()
          Returns the specific Color object of the selected Shape.

          Tests to see if a point is located on the Shape.

          Tests to see if a Shape is currently 'selected'.

Method Detail

getColor

Color getColor()
Returns the specific Color object of the selected Shape.

Returns:
Color of the selected shape.

isOn

boolean isOn(int x,
             int y)
Tests to see if a point is located on the Shape.

Parameters:
x - the x-coordinate of the point to be tested.
y - the y-coordinate of the point to be tested.
Returns:
true if the given x,y coordinates are on the Shape.

isSelected

boolean isSelected()
Tests to see if a Shape is currently 'selected'.

Returns:
true if this Shape is selected.

moveUpperLeftTo

void moveUpperLeftTo(int newX,
                     int newY)
Moves the upper left corner of the bounding box of the Shape. This does not deform the Shape.

Parameters:
newX - new x-coordinate of the bounding box of the Shape.
newY - new y-coordinate of the bounding box of the Shape.

paintComponent

void paintComponent(Graphics g)

setColor

void setColor(Color c)
Sets the color of the selected Shape.

Parameters:
c - Color object the Shape will be set to.

setSelected

void setSelected(boolean b)
Sets a Shape's selected status.

Parameters:
b - the true/false selected status the Shape will be set to.

shiftUpperLeftBy

void shiftUpperLeftBy(int deltaX,
                      int deltaY)
Translates the upper left corner of the bounding box of the Shape. This does not set a new location but rather moves the Shape along the x-y axes.

Parameters:
deltaX - shifts the Shape x number of pixels right
deltaY - shifts the Shape y number of pixels down

toString

String toString()
Provides a String representation of the Shape. Intended for testing purposes.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
String representation of this Shape.
